lead_paragraph: CASPER--Chester, of Quogue, NY, passed away peacefully at home on June 16, 2016 at the age of 85. The son of Moses and Anna Casper, born in Brooklyn, graduate of NYU with an accounting degree in 1951. He led Delaware Industries, an import-export textile company for forty years. He is survived by his beloved wife of 61 years, Muriel (Brockman); sister Judy (Bernard) Kaufman, predeceased by Beverly (Sheldon) Thaler; daughters Marlane (Harvey) Guttmann, Carie (Spencer) Sax and Lynne Casper; grandchildren David (Katy) Guttmann, Arielle, Allison, Margaux and great-grandson Alexander. In lieu of flowers, donations may be made to East End Hospice, Westhampton, NY. 1/3
